title: How to homeschool a first grader with me as her teacher - Quora

response.answer_text: You have been homeschooling her as a baby, toddler and preschooler. Not much needs changing. Parents have content expertise to teach their kids up to about a grade 8 level without teachers guides. You just need to get your confidence back. 150 of mass institutional schooling has “schooled” the confidence out of parents as teachers. You were her first teacher and you are still her best teacher. Just model curiosity and how to “find out” and she will love learning. That is the best gift you can give her.

Don’t make a big deal of it, first of all. You are homeschooling a Grade 1 child? Play with them, use your imagination and allow them to use theirs. Build forts, make stuff, bake a cake, (they can break the eggs for you) measure something and read read read
